title: Paradise Lost - why doesn't Satan enter by gate

content.question: According to the passage, why does Satan not enter the garden by the gate?

choices.label: The gate is protected by God.
The gate is hidden by overgrown shrubbery.
He is contemptuous of proper procedures.
He fears an encounter with other creatures.

content.answer: He is contemptuous of proper procedures.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
